cast.name: 奈杰尔·法拉奇 Nigel Farage

this_title: The Pub Landlord v Nigel Farage: The Battle for South Thanet
introduction: In 2015, Britain's titans of common sense were to clash in the Kent constituency of South Thanet, the most hotly contested seat in the most unpredictable general election for thirty years. With exclusive access to his campaign, all the inevitable personal highs and lows are laid bare as the Guv's heart stopping parliamentary bid sends a bolt of lightning crashing through the body politic.
chinese_title: The Pub Landlord v Nigel Farage: The Battle for South Thanet
